response.overview: Relive the hits of "Don't Forget Me", "Someday", and "Thin Red Line" through their visually stunning music videos. This release from Capitol EMI features the band at their best with top-notch production and direction. The DVD is in the format of music videos, making it a must-have for any Glass Tiger fan or collector of music videos. Released in 2005, this DVD contains all the hits from one of Canada's greatest bands.
response.title: Glass Tiger. No Turning Back
